#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
    int c1,c2,c3,count1,count2,count3,x1,x2,x3,n,t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
              count1=0,count2=0,count3=0,x1=1,x2=1,x3=1,c1=0,c2=0,c3=0;
              scanf("%d",&n);
              while(1)
              {
  	                  x1=5*x1;
                      c1=n/x1;
                      count1=c1+count1;
                      
                      x2=2*x2;
                      if(n/x2==0)
                      break;
                      c2=n/x2;
                      count2=c2+count2;
                      
                      x3=3*x3;
                      c3=n/x3;
                      count3=c3+count3;
              }
              printf("%d\n%d\n%d\n",count2,count3,count1);
    }
    return 0;
}
